Title: Born Into Bad News
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Craig Gore, Tim Walsh, Cole Maliska (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Voight comes up against a younger, more violent version of himself while trying to extract Commander Perry's nephew from a unit of corrupt officers.
